SongLyrics.JpnStr: 無敵[むてき]の笑顔[えがお]で荒[あら]すメディア
SongLyrics.EngStr: The media, ravaged by an invincible smile

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 知[し]りたいその秘密[ひみつ]ミステリアス
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to know that mysterious secret

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 抜[ぬ]けてるとこさえ彼女[かのじょ]のエリア
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even her clumsy parts are her domain

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 完璧[かんぺき]で嘘[うそ]つきな君[きみ]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: You, perfect and full of lies

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 天才的[てんさいてき]なアイドル様[さま]
SongLyrics.EngStr: A genius-like idol

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今日[きょう]何[なに]食[た]べた?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What did you eat today?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 好[す]きな本[ほん]は?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What's your favorite book?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 遊[あそ]びに行[い]くならどこに行[い]くの?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Where do you go if you go out?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]も食[た]べてない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I haven't eaten anything

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それは内緒[ないしょ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's a secret

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]を聞[き]かれてものらりくらり
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter what you ask, I dodge the question

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そう淡々[たんたん]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: So calmly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけど燦々[さんさん]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: But brilliantly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 見[み]えそうで見[み]えない秘密[ひみつ]は蜜[みつ]の味[あじ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: A secret that seems visible but isn't is as sweet as honey

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あれもないないない
SongLyrics.EngStr: There's none of that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: これもないないない
SongLyrics.EngStr: There's none of this either

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 好[す]きなタイプは?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What's your type?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 相手[あいて]は?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Who's your partner?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さあ答[こた]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Go on, answer

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「誰[だれ]かを好[す]きになることなんて私[わたし]分[わ]からなくてさ」
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't really know what it means to love someone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嘘[うそ]か本当[ほんとう]か知[し]り得[え]ない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't know if it's a lie or the truth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんな言葉[ことば]にまた一人[ひとり]堕[お]ちる
SongLyrics.EngStr: With those words, another person falls for you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: また好[す]きにさせる
SongLyrics.EngStr: You make them fall in love again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]もが目[め]を奪[うば]われていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: Everyone is captivated by you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]は完璧[かんぺき]で究極[きゅうきょく]のアイドル
SongLyrics.EngStr: You are a perfect, ultimate idol

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 金輪際[こんりんざい]現[あらわ]れない
SongLyrics.EngStr: One who will never appear again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一番星[いちばんぼし]の生[う]まれ変[か]わり
SongLyrics.EngStr: A reincarnation of the first star

SongLyrics.JpnStr: その笑顔[えがお]で愛[あい]してるで
SongLyrics.EngStr: With that smile, you say 'I love you'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]も彼[かれ]も虜[とりこ]にしていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: You make everyone your captive

SongLyrics.JpnStr: その瞳[ひとみ]がその言葉[ことば]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: Those eyes, those words

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嘘[うそ]でもそれは完全[かんぜん]なアイ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if it's a lie, it's a perfect 'I'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: はいはいあの子[こ]は特別[とくべつ]です
SongLyrics.EngStr: Yes, yes, that girl is special

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 我々[われわれ]はハナからおまけです
SongLyrics.EngStr: We were side characters from the start

SongLyrics.JpnStr: お星様[ほしさま]の引[ひ]き立[た]て役[やく]Bです
SongLyrics.EngStr: We're just supporting actors to the star

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 全[すべ]てがあの子[こ]のお陰[かげ]なわけない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Not everything is thanks to her

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 洒落臭[しゃらくさ]い
SongLyrics.EngStr: How pretentious

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 妬[ねた]み嫉妬[しっと]なんてないわけがない
SongLyrics.EngStr: There's no way I don't feel jealousy or envy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: これはネタじゃない
SongLyrics.EngStr: This isn't a joke

SongLyrics.JpnStr: からこそ許[ゆる]せない
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's why I can't forgive

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 完璧[かんぺき]じゃない君[きみ]じゃ許[ゆる]せない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't forgive anyone who's not perfect like you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 自分[じぶん]を許[ゆる]せない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't forgive myself

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]よりも強[つよ]い君[きみ]以外[いがい]は認[みと]めない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't acknowledge anyone except someone stronger than you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]もが信[しん]じ崇[あが]めてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Everyone believes and worships you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まさに最強[さいきょう]で無敵[むてき]のアイドル
SongLyrics.EngStr: The strongest and invincible idol

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 弱点[じゃくてん]なんて見当[みあ]たらない
SongLyrics.EngStr: There are no visible weaknesses

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一番星[いちばんぼし]を宿[やど]している
SongLyrics.EngStr: You possess the brightest star

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 弱[よわ]いとこなんて見[み]せちゃダメダメ
SongLyrics.EngStr: You mustn't show your weaknesses

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 知[し]りたくないとこは見[み]せずに
SongLyrics.EngStr: You hide the things we don't want to know

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 唯一無二[ゆいいつむに]じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't want anything but a one-of-a-kind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それこそ本物[ほんもの]のアイ
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's what makes a true 'I'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 得意[とくい]の笑顔[えがお]で沸[わ]かすメディア
SongLyrics.EngStr: With a confident smile, you excite the media

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 隠[かく]しきるこの秘密[ひみつ]だけは
SongLyrics.EngStr: You keep this secret hidden

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]してるって嘘[うそ]で積[つ]むキャリア
SongLyrics.EngStr: Building your career on the lie of 'I love you'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: これこそ私[わたし]なりの愛[あい]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: This is my own kind of love

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 流[なが]れる汗[あせ]も綺麗[きれい]なアクア
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even my flowing sweat is beautiful like aqua

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ルビーを隠[かく]したこの瞼[まぶた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: These eyelids hide rubies

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 歌[うた]い踊[おど]り舞[ま]う私[わたし]はマリア
SongLyrics.EngStr: I sing, dance, and perform like Maria

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そう嘘[うそ]はとびきりの愛[あい]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Yes, lies are the ultimate form of love

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]かに愛[あい]されたことも
SongLyrics.EngStr: I've never been loved by anyone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]かのこと愛[あい]したこともない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Nor have I ever loved anyone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんな私[わたし]の嘘[うそ]がいつか本当[ほんとう]になること
SongLyrics.EngStr: But I believe that one day, my lies will become the truth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 信[しん]じてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I believe it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつかきっと全部[ぜんぶ]手[て]に入[い]れる
SongLyrics.EngStr: One day, I'll have everything

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]はそう欲張[よくば]りなアイドル
SongLyrics.EngStr: I am such a greedy idol

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 等身大[とうしんだい]でみんなのこと
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to love everyone equally

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ちゃんと愛[あい]したいから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because I want to love them properly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今日[きょう]も嘘[うそ]をつくの
SongLyrics.EngStr: I lie again today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この言葉[ことば]がいつか本当[ほんとう]になる日[ひ]を願[ねが]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Wishing for the day these words become true

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それでもまだ君[きみ]と君[きみ]にだけは言[い]えずにいたけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: But I still couldn't say it to you, and only to you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ああ やっと言[い]えた
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ah, I finally said it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: これは絶対[ぜったい]嘘[うそ]じゃない
SongLyrics.EngStr: This is definitely not a lie

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]してる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I love you
